mapper.select: SELECT FROM `order` WHERE buyer_id = #{userId} OR seller_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT FROM `order` ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURDATE()
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) FROM `order` WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURDATE() AND status = 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` ( order_no, order_type, buyer_id, seller_id, seller_type, product_id, product_name, product_image, spec_id, spec_desc, price, quantity, total_amount, status, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_address, buyer_remark, create_time ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{orderType}, #{buyerId}, #{sellerId}, #{sellerType}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{productImage}, #{specId}, #{specDesc}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{totalAmount}, #{status}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{receiverAddress}, #{buyerRemark}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order`
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE status = #{status}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN buyer_id IS NOT NULL THEN buyer_id ELSE seller_id END ) FROM `order` WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(total_amount), 0) FROM `order` WHERE status = #{status}

SELECT DATE(create_time) as date, COUNT(*) as order_count, COALESCE(SUM(total_amount), 0) as amount FROM `order` WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY DATE(create_time) ORDER BY date

SELECT DATE(create_time) as date, COALESCE(SUM(total_amount), 0) as amount, COUNT(*) as order_count FROM `order` WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND status = 3 GROUP BY DATE(create_time) ORDER BY date
SELECT FROM `order` WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} AND status IN (0, 1, 4) ORDER BY CASE WHEN status = 1 THEN 0 WHEN status = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, create_time ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId}
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(total_amount), 0) FROM `order` WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} AND status = 3
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId} AND status IN (1, 4)

SELECT DATE(o.create_time) as date, COUNT(*) as order_count, COALESCE(SUM(o.total_amount), 0) as amount, COUNT(DISTINCT pv.visitor_id) as visitor_count FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN product_visit pv ON DATE(pv.visit_time) = DATE(o.create_time) WHERE o.seller_id = #{merchantId} AND o.status = 3 AND o.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY DATE(o.create_time) ORDER BY date

SELECT p.id as product_id, p.name as product_name, p.images as product_image, p.price, COUNT(o.id) as sale_count, COALESCE(SUM(o.total_amount), 0) as sale_amount, p.view_count FROM product p LEFT JOIN `order` o ON p.id = o.product_id AND o.status = 3 WHERE p.user_id = #{merchantId} GROUP BY p.id, p.name, p.images, p.price, p.view_count ORDER BY sale_count DESC, sale_amount DESC LIMIT #{limit}
